original_text: “‘You profane and wicked prince of Israel, whose day has come, whose time of punishment has reached its climax,
korean_text: 너 극악하여 중상을 당할 이스라엘 왕아 네 날이 이르렀나니 곧 죄악의 마지막 때이니라

sentences.original_text: You profane and wicked prince of Israel
whose time of punishment has reached its climax
